content: ⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡ One of our bitcoin runners Olen Musk accidently sold his bitcoin and can no longer compete in the race. We need a replacement! ⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡Name our new bitcoin racer, a champion of bitcoin and cryptocurrency. Each unique entry(1 per user) will be awarded 1000 satoshis, with the chosen name winning 30000 satoshis.Write your names here, the winner will be chosen on August 1st.Don't know what bitcoin racing is? Come check it out at Macaw.casinoCurrent Runners:AmmousButerinBukeleDorseySatoshiAntonopoulosMuskMcAfee⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡⚡ ⚡
